text_block_list.name: Narita Brian
text_block_list.text: Phew... That's it for today.

text_block_list.name: Narita Brian
text_block_list.text: Sure.

text_block_list.name: Narita Brian
text_block_list.text: I guess.

text_block_list.name: Narita Brian
text_block_list.text: Me too.
choice_data_list: Wanna get some food? My treat.

text_block_list.name: Narita Brian
text_block_list.text: Still feeling chatty, huh?

text_block_list.name: Narita Brian
text_block_list.text: I'll just hit up the cafeteria. Laters.

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text: As briskly as I'm brushed off, Narita<n>Brian walks away.

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
I'm still trying to learn more about<n>her, so I try to strike up a<n>
conversation whenever I can...

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text: But we've yet to have a real<n>back-and-forth.

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
Today, I'm on my way to the<n>shopping mall to buy some
things.<n>Suddenly...

text_block_list.name: Narita Brian
text_block_list.text: ...Oh, it's you.
choice_data_list: Hey there. You doing some shopping too?

text_block_list.name: Narita Brian
text_block_list.text: Sigh... The student council isbeing a pain. They asked me to getsomething for them.

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
We're headed for the same place.<n>This could be a great
chance to spend<n>time together. I should ask her—

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text: And she's gone...

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
Maybe she doesn't trust me as<n>much as I thought. I guess
she really<n>doesn't want to do anything together<n>besides
training.

text_block_list.name: Narita Brian
text_block_list.text: Hey.

text_block_list.name: Narita Brian
text_block_list.text: What's the holdup? Come on.

text_block_list.name: Narita Brian
text_block_list.text: You're going to the mall too, aren't<n>you?

text_block_list.name: Narita Brian
text_block_list.text: Hurry it up then.

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
We've arrived at the mall, but I can<n>see from a distance that
the stores<n>are packed.

text_block_list.name: Narita Brian
text_block_list.text: Let's go.

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
Undaunted by the crowds, she picks a<n>store and walks right
inside.

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
I manage to get my shopping done,<n>but I realize Brian isn't
anywhere to<n>be seen...

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
I look around for her to no avail. With<n>little else to try, I head
outside and<n>realize it's already dark out.

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text: That's when...

text_block_list.name: Elated Young Man
text_block_list.text:
Whoa, it's Narita Brian! I saw you<n>race! Hey, can I take a
pic?

text_block_list.name: Narita Brian
text_block_list.text: ...Get lost.

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
Brian flat out refuses the fan and<n>drives him off. Then she
glances over<n>in my direction.

text_block_list.name: Narita Brian
text_block_list.text: Finally... Took you long enough.
choice_data_list: I thought you went home by yourself.

text_block_list.name: Narita Brian
text_block_list.text: ...Nope. 'Cause it's dark.

text_block_list.name: Narita Brian
text_block_list.text: Let's go.

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text: It is dangerous to walk thestreets alone at night, but I can'timagine her being too concernedabout that.

text_block_list.name: Narita Brian
text_block_list.text: Just walk already. Or I'll leave you<n>behind.

text_block_list.name: Narita Brian
text_block_list.text: (Worried... Was I worried? I'd actually<n>like to know.)

text_block_list.name: Narita Brian
text_block_list.text:
When we got separated, I imagined<n>my trainer looking for
me.

text_block_list.name: Narita Brian
text_block_list.text: I didn't even consider any other<n>possibility.

text_block_list.name: Narita Brian
text_block_list.text: So I just... stopped right there. I chose<n>to wait.

text_block_list.name: Narita Brian
text_block_list.text:
I didn't complain or feel frustrated... I<n>just stood there
patiently.

text_block_list.name: Narita Brian
text_block_list.text: This feeling is kind of familiar.

text_block_list.name: Narita Brian
text_block_list.text: Is this nostalgia? It feels like when I<n>was a kid...

text_block_list.name: Narita Brian
text_block_list.text: ...You never get tired of trying to talk<n>to me, do you?

text_block_list.name: Narita Brian
text_block_list.text:
Even though I never say much in<n>return. Normally that'd
drive a person<n>away.

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
I can believe that. But whenever I say<n>something, she
always listens. And<n>honestly...
choice_data_list: The fact that you're willing to listen is enough.

text_block_list.name: Narita Brian
text_block_list.text: Hmph... You must be out of your mind.

text_block_list.name: Narita Brian
text_block_list.text:
I don't have to hand this stuff in until<n>tomorrow. Laters,
Trainer.

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
I thank her for waiting for me and she<n>heads home without
another word.

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
Awkward as it may have been, I feel<n>glad to have caught a
glimpse of Narita<n>Brian's kind side.
